alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 20 at 5:46AM PST until November 20 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 29 to 31 degrees expected, with isolated temperatures as low as 26 degrees. * WHERE...Cuyama Valley, Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions may kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
